title: Any one else name their stuff after LoL champions?
body:
I was wondering if anyone else out there names their stuff after champions. If so please comment below.

I named my car Fiora because she is sexy, deadly, fast, and silver. (She is a Mazda RX-8 for those interested)

replies.body: I have two cats named Rengar and Nidalee. :3
That's awesome. I want to get two cats and name them Ratchet and Daxter.
Ratchet and Clank was one of my favorite games growing up! :D
My oldest son's (1yo) middle name is Darius, not after the champ, after the conqueror, but still, same name.
Thats cool. Were I to have kids I would probably incorporate champion names in there somehow. Or possibly Star Wars character names.
I am sure your son, John Twisted-Fate Doeson, will just love you for that. XP
More like Giant Veigar Robot-Camels Jr.
My daughter is named Evelynn

> [{quoted}](name=AhhShucks,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Orp6mz0K,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-05-21T18:08:57.739+0000)
>
> My daughter is named Evelynn

"Honey, have you seen Evelynn?"
"No. It's like if she turns invisible or something..."
"Evelynn....**EVELYNNNNNNN**"

A whisper from nowhere in particular: "I like it when they scream"

She likes to go hide in the curtains and and say "I am batman" In the scariest voice she can manage.

Not quite as good as "I like it when they scream", but pretty amusing nonetheless.

> [{quoted}](name=AhhShucks,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Orp6mz0K,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-05-21T18:08:57.739+0000)
>
> My daughter is named Evelynn

Mine too!  My daughter was actually born in December of 09 which is when I started playing league.  I mained Evelynn as my first champ.
I mained Evelynn for awhile too, but my daughter was actually named after my Godmother. Evelynn being a champion I played was mostly just coincidence.

I sometimes think how much my hypothetical kids would hate me if I named them after a video game character.

"Roll call! Timmy?"

"Here!"

"Alice?"

"Here, Ma'am!"

"Luxanna Tifa Alexstraza?"

"Just... just Lux, please."

You must get mad poon with a car like that.

Anything special under the hood?
Haha. Its a rotary engine. This thing is made to go fast.
But how much can it tow? LOL jk im fucking with you I would kill for a car like that.
One of my cats is named Talon =/
I'd hit it.
You have no idea. #LoveThisCar

Two turtles names Teemo and Corki. My 3 and 6 year old boys named them. We gave Gnar away.

http://i58.tinypic.com/1rvscp.jpg
In pokemon XY i named a Lucario Blitz. I had another one already so i put that one into my pokemon bank
I named my left *** Sion and my right one Teemo. Yeah, I tend to freak out the ladies...
Get your license plate changed too if you love supports name it {{champion:40}}

I was thinking maybe it's time I got a cat.

If it's male, I'll name him Veigar.

If it's female, I'll name her Irelia.
Only thing that I've done is named one of my Guild Wars 2 characters after Diana (She's a thief). If I get around to making a female Paragon, will probably name her Leona.
